41 Brookpine Drive
Huntington-Shelton, Ct
$ 294,900
Style: Colonial, Builder's own home full of thoughtful functional and
decorative features, wonderfully situated on a culdesac along with
property on 3 sides designated as permanent Open Space by the City of
Shelton. The lot is 1.23 acres of treed property with public water
supply and private septic system (garden plot in the rear yard is best
location for in-ground pool).
Home consists of: 8 rms, 4 bedrms, 2.5 baths, full basement with
walkout, 2 car garage under with 1 car garage under porch area.
3 season enclosed porch, rear deck for cooking grill.
• Wonderfully unique masterbedrm. design offers a 1st and 2"^ floor
option with access to full baths and big cioset sizes.
• Please note some of these special features: Random wide plank
pegged floors in kitchen & family rm., 3 French doors (2 pocket
style off kitchen). Full crown mldg. in Living & Din. rms. as well as
hand crafted beams & base mldg. in family rm.. Solid 6 panel int.
doors, numerous ceiling fans, all light fixtures (dining rm. fixture
solid brass from Portugal).
• Kitchen has Oak cabinets, double sink, built in desk, closet pantry.
• Tempered glass used in big window at kitchen table & fixed glass
skylite in hallway to porch.
• Skylites in family rm. are opening type with shades.
• Rumford fireplace in family rm. has outside air draw venting for
efficiency, (Rumford was a compatriot of Ben Franklin who
originated a formula for the most efficient firebox configuration,
that formula was utilized in the this home's fireplace design.
• Exterior windows are longer style thermopane with removable grills.
• Main level laundry (storage shelving) in half bath off kitchen.
• Oil hot water baseboard heating, 3 zones, interior oil tank.
• 200 Amp electrical service, Amway security alarm system on doors.
• Automatic garage door opener in front unit only.
• Taxes $ 3,347 yearly.
• Appliances included: Electric oven-range, microwave, dishwasher.
Refrigerator, clothes washer & dryer, all window treatments.
• Basement plumbed for additional half bath.
